text.text_translated: A big ground shake is when the ground shakes a lot. Big ground shakes can break buildings and bridges. Luckily, bridges do not fall down very often. This is true for new bridges, especially. Engineers design safer bridges in places with big ground shakes. They build on strong ground that does not move much.

An earthquake is when the ground shakes a lot.
Earthquakes can break buildings and bridges.
Luckily, bridges do not fall down very often.
This is true for new bridges, especially.
